name: Talentless
description: A blank canvas in a world of prodigies. Your lack of birthright gifts births true freedom: you carve your own path and prove that willpower outshines natural talent.
flavor: They wrote you off as worthless—now watch them eat their words as you rise.

strengths.name: Prism of Potential
strengths.description: Once per level, gain +5 to any secondary stat of your choice.

strengths.name: Accelerated Vitals
strengths.description: +10 regen per second to, health, stamina, and mana out of combat.

strengths.name: Gear Amplification
strengths.description: Every equipped item grants +1% to its primary stat.

strengths.name: Unpredictable Dodge
strengths.description: Dodge window increased by 0.02 per point of Dexterity. Succesful dodge recovers lost stamina.

weaknesses.name: Mortal Frame
weaknesses.description: Base health, stamina, dexterity: -10% below class average.

weaknesses.name: Latent Awakening
weaknesses.description: Class specific abilities unlock two skill-tree tiers later than other classes.

weaknesses.name: Weak Resistances
weaknesses.description: -5 to physical, magic, and chemical resistance.

weaknesses.name: Hallow Core
weaknesses.description: No built in abilities, relying on skill-tree and gear.

name: Swordsman
description: The storm that is approaching, steel in hand. Every strike is an aria of honor and might—your legacy forged in clashing blades.
flavor: When your sword sings, hope and fear ride its notes.

strengths.name: Stamina Efficiency
strengths.description: -10% stamina cost on attacks; +15% stamina regen out of combat.

strengths.name: Rend and Return
strengths.description: On a perfect parry, trigger a riposte reflecting the attack back onto the enemy.

strengths.name: Global Interval Intervention
strengths.description: Every heavy skill used delays the enemy next interval timer by +0.5s.

weaknesses.name: Zero Mana
weaknesses.description: Begin with 0 in all magical status.

name: Marksman
description: A phantom in the foliage. Your arrows whisper death before it arrives—silent, precise, inevitable.
flavor: They never hear you coming; they only feel the end.

strengths.name: Hawkeye Precision
strengths.description: +20% crit chance, successful crits restore 1 ammo.

strengths.name: Ammo Conservation
strengths.description: 10% chance to not consume ammo. +50% ammo limit.

strengths.name: Stillness of the Hunt
strengths.description: After 4 seconds out of combat. Next shot deals 30% more damage, and is a guarantreed crit.

strengths.name: Trapcraft
strengths.description: +15% detect/disarm chance; can deplay snares that delay enemy timers on trigger.

strengths.name: Wind Compensation
strengths.description: In windy areas, the eyesight penalty is reduced by 50%.

name: Magician
description: Weaver of the impossible, you bend reality’s threads. Your spells are symphonies of arcane power—beautiful, lethal, unstoppable.
flavor: With every incantation, you pay the void’s price—but the world demands your sacrifice.

strengths.name: Leyline Convergence
strengths.description: Every 5 spells casted, next spell deals 20% bonus damage.

strengths.name: Spellwrights Efficiency
strengths.description: -18% mana cost on all spells, each cast returns 5% of max mana.

strengths.name: Celestial Ward
strengths.description: Have a protective shield, absorbs damange equal to 12% of current mana, perfect dodges will reduce cooldowns, and restore mana.

strengths.name: Spellforge Infinity
strengths.description: 8% of all damage you deal is stored. At 100% your next spell is cast instantly, and deals 50% bonus damage.

weaknesses.name: Glass Conduit
weaknesses.description: -30% base health, -12% physical resistance. Heavy hits reduce mana.

weaknesses.name: Weave Lock
weaknesses.description: Every spell locks your movement, interrupted casters take +60% damage.

weaknesses.name: Mana Thirst
weaknesses.description: Magic debuffs are 40% more effective on you.
